verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) Do not fret <S%H2734><s%> because of evildoers, <S%H7489><s%> Be not envious <S%H7065><s%> toward wrongdoers. <S%H9390><s%>
For they will wither <S%H9268><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> like the grass, <S%H2682><s%> And fade <S%H5034><s%> like the green <S%H3418><s%> herb. <S%H1877><s%>
Trust <S%H982><s%> in the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> good; <S%H9185><s%> Dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> and cultivate <S%H9565><s%> faithfulness. <S%H530><s%>
Delight <S%H6026><s%> yourself in the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> And He will give <S%H5414><s%> you the desires <S%H4862><s%> of your heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Commit <S%H1556><s%> your way <S%H1870><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Trust <S%H982><s%> also in Him, and He will do <S%H6213><s%> it.
And He will bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> your righteousness <S%H6664><s%> as the light, <S%H216><s%> And your judgment <S%H4941><s%> as the noonday. <S%H6672><s%>

Rest <S%H1826><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and wait <S%H9123><s%> patiently <S%H9123><s%> for Him; Do not fret <S%H2734><s%> because of him who prospers <S%H6743><s%> in his way, <S%H1870><s%> Because of the man <S%H376><s%> who carries <S%H6213><s%> out wicked <S%H4209><s%> schemes. <S%H4209><s%>
Cease <S%H7503><s%> from anger, <S%H639><s%> and forsake <S%H5800><s%> wrath; <S%H2534><s%> Do not fret, <S%H2734><s%> [it leads] only <S%H389><s%> to evildoing. <S%H7489><s%>
For evildoers <S%H7489><s%> will be cut <S%H3772><s%> off, <S%H3772><s%> But those who wait <S%H6960><s%> for the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> they will inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

Yet <S%H5750><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> while <S%H4592><s%> and the wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H7563><s%> will be no <S%H369><s%> more; <S%H369><s%> And you will look <S%H995><s%> carefully <S%H995><s%> for his place, <S%H4725><s%> and he will not be [there.]
But the humble <S%H6035><s%> will inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> And will delight <S%H6026><s%> themselves in abundant <S%H7230><s%> prosperity. <S%H7965><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> plots <S%H2161><s%> against the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> And gnashes <S%H2786><s%> at him with his teeth. <S%H8127><s%>
The Lord <S%H136><s%> laughs <S%H7832><s%> at him; For He sees <S%H7200><s%> his day <S%H3117><s%> is coming. <S%H935><s%>

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> have drawn <S%H6605><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> and bent <S%H1869><s%> their bow, <S%H7198><s%> To cast <S%H5307><s%> down <S%H5307><s%> the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and the needy, <S%H34><s%> To slay <S%H2873><s%> those who <S%H3477><s%> are upright <S%H3477><s%> in conduct. <S%H1870><s%>
Their sword <S%H2719><s%> will enter <S%H935><s%> their own heart, <S%H3820><s%> And their bows <S%H7198><s%> will be broken. <S%H7665><s%>
Better <S%H2896><s%> is the little <S%H4592><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> Than <S%H4480><s%> the abundance <S%H1995><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
For the arms <S%H2220><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will be broken; <S%H7665><s%> But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> sustains <S%H5564><s%> the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of the blameless; <S%H8549><s%> And their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> will be forever. <S%H5769><s%>
They will not be ashamed <S%H954><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of evil; <S%H9567><s%> And in the days <S%H3117><s%> of famine <S%H7459><s%> they will have <S%H7646><s%> abundance. <S%H7646><s%>

But the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will perish; And the enemies <S%H6><s%> of the Lord <S%H340><s%> will be like the glory <S%H3068><s%> of the pastures, <S%H3368><s%> They vanish <S%H9221><s%> â€“ like smoke <S%H3615><s%> they vanish <S%H6227><s%> away.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> borrows <S%H9233><s%> and does not pay <S%H9608><s%> back, <S%H9608><s%> But the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is gracious <S%H2603><s%> and gives. <S%H5414><s%>
For those blessed <S%H1288><s%> by Him will inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> But those cursed <S%H7043><s%> by Him will be cut <S%H3772><s%> off. <S%H3772><s%>
The steps <S%H4703><s%> of a man <S%H1397><s%> are established <S%H3559><s%> by the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> And He delights <S%H2654><s%> in his way. <S%H1870><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> he falls, <S%H5307><s%> he shall not be hurled <S%H2904><s%> headlong; <S%H2904><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is the One who holds <S%H5564><s%> his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

I have been <S%H1961><s%> young, <S%H5288><s%> and now <S%H1571><s%> I am old; <S%H2204><s%> Yet I have not seen <S%H7200><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> forsaken, <S%H5800><s%> Or his descendants <S%H2233><s%> begging <S%H1245><s%> bread. <S%H3899><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long he is gracious <S%H2603><s%> and lends; <S%H9233><s%> And his descendants <S%H2233><s%> are a blessing. <S%H1293><s%>
Depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil, <S%H9563><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> good, <S%H9185><s%> So you will abide <S%H7931><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> justice, <S%H4941><s%> And does not forsake <S%H5800><s%> His godly <S%H2623><s%> ones; <S%H2623><s%> They are preserved <S%H8104><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> But the descendants <S%H2233><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will be cut <S%H3772><s%> off. <S%H3772><s%>
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> will inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> And dwell <S%H7931><s%> in it forever. <S%H5703><s%>
The mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> utters <S%H1897><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> And his tongue <S%H3956><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> justice. <S%H4941><s%>
The law <S%H8451><s%> of his God <S%H430><s%> is in his heart; <S%H3820><s%> His steps <S%H9036><s%> do not slip. <S%H4571><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> spies <S%H6822><s%> upon the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> And seeks <S%H1245><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> him.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will not leave <S%H5800><s%> him in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> Or let him be condemned <S%H7561><s%> when he is judged. <S%H8199><s%>

Wait <S%H6960><s%> for the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> His way, <S%H1870><s%> And He will exalt <S%H7311><s%> you to inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> When the wicked <S%H7563><s%> are cut <S%H3772><s%> off, <S%H3772><s%> you will see <S%H7200><s%> it.

I have seen <S%H7200><s%> a violent, <S%H6184><s%> wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H7563><s%> Spreading <S%H6168><s%> himself like a luxuriant <S%H7488><s%> tree <S%H249><s%> in its native <S%H249><s%> soil.
Then he passed <S%H5674><s%> away, <S%H5674><s%> and lo, <S%H2009><s%> he was no <S%H369><s%> more; <S%H369><s%> I sought <S%H1245><s%> for him, but he could not be found. <S%H4672><s%>

Mark <S%H8104><s%> the blameless <S%H8535><s%> man, <S%H8535><s%> and behold <S%H7200><s%> the upright; <S%H3477><s%> For the man <S%H376><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> will have a posterity. <S%H319><s%>
But transgressors <S%H6586><s%> will be altogether <S%H9191><s%> destroyed; <S%H8045><s%> The posterity <S%H319><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will be cut <S%H3772><s%> off. <S%H3772><s%>
But the salvation <S%H8668><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is from the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> He is their strength <S%H4581><s%> in time <S%H6256><s%> of trouble. <S%H6869><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> helps <S%H5826><s%> them, and delivers <S%H6403><s%> them; He delivers <S%H6403><s%> them from the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> and saves <S%H3467><s%> them, Because <S%H3588><s%> they take <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Him.
